      • getAPK

        protected abstract java.io.File getAPK(ProductInformation product)
        Runs on UI thread, must be quick (i.e. file already on filesystem). If long running, then impls should override install() and getAPK() to offline to background thread
        Parameters:
        product - the product information
        Returns:
        the apk associated with the product information
